transcript:
Customer: Hello?

Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan?
Executive: Devad Deep Global Market.
Customer: Haan, yes.
Executive: Haan, ma'am, uh, se baat kar raha hu IndiaMART office se. Uh, ek concern ke liye maine phone kiya tha ma'am aapko.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Aapne WhatsApp pe photo share kiye the regarding product update. To vahi puchhna chah raha tha ma'am ki ki matlab kya karna hai? Add karna hai usko Devad Deep spices, Rachi Wada masala hai, fresh wadu.
Customer: Maine already add kiya hai product just wo uh primary photo na change karna matlab change karna hai primary photo.
Executive: Primary photo change karni hai aapko?
Customer: Haan, primary photo matlab jo main uh details dikh raha hai na wo dalna hai.
Primary photo jo aa rahi hai na wo uh [unintelligible] dalna hai. Matlab pehla photo mujhe jo usme naam wagera aa raha hai na details wo dalna hai. Wo dalna hai primary photo.
Executive: Theek hai, primary photo mein. Ab ye jo fish masala hota hai na ek tarah ka ma'am ye Rachi Wada masala.
Customer: Haan, haan.
Executive: Ye kahan pe to pada hua hai ma'am ye wala. Main screenshot bhej doon aapko?
Customer: Haan, bhej dijiye.
Executive: Ek minute call. Aapka WhatsApp number kya hoga ma'am?
Customer: Yehi hai.
Executive: Actually ye maine IndiaMART uh aapke customer care number se call kiya hai na to number visible bhejta nahi hai hamare paas aapka personal.
Customer: 8805922360.
Executive: 8805
Customer: 922360
Executive: 9226
Customer: 360
Executive: 360
Customer: Haan, theek hai. Main aapko wo bhejta hu na. Ek baar check karna.
Executive: Isme kuch changes karane hai kya aapko?
Executive: On call ek baar ma'am apna WhatsApp check kijiyega.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: WhatsApp receive hua aapko?
Customer: Haan, haan, yes.
Executive: Theek hai.

Executive: To ye abhi sahi hai?
Customer: Okay, ye theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai. Aur bhi na aapke paas jo total product yahan pe mention hai ma'am wo sirf aur sirf char product hai. To at least yahan pe 12 se 20 product hone chahiye ma'am. Taki apne company ka na keywords acche se promote ho sake.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Theek hai. Abhi char product mein Rachi Wada masala hai, garam masala powder hai, red chilli powder hai aur saucer hai, kulat style tea cup wala.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To sirf inhi char product mein aap deal karte hain?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Aur agar koi product nahi hai aapke paas?
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: Aapki matlab manufacturing khud ki hai masale ki?
Customer: Haan, haan, yes.
Executive: Theek hai. Isi mein main ma'am koshish kar raha hu kuch keywords aur bhi add kar de. Taki alag alag ek baar na ek product ko alag alag naam se search karta hai.
Customer: Theek hai. Nahi, nahi, uh
Executive: Bataiye.
Customer: Main abhi to abhi mat kijiye wo alag alag product mein na.
Executive: Achcha achcha.
Executive: Wo abhi matlab aap owner hai aapke ma'am abhi working hai aapke staff hai?
Customer: Owner hu.
Executive: Owner hai? Haan to phir aapko na main aapko ek ek achche matlab visibility de deta hu matlab sab samajhne ke liye ki aap abhi new ho IndiaMART par ya abhi kaafi time ho gaya?
Customer: Uh hua hai time hua hai.
Executive: Ho gaya? Theek hai. Main kuch kuch cheeze jaise bata deta hu aapko. Aap matlab Panji Goa se hai na?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Theek hai. To wahan pe dekhiye ek company hai Mohan N Chari Rice and Flour Mill company. MNC gold naam se hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Theek hai. To unka keyword main bata deta hu kya kya hai. Unhone dekho red chilli powder mein 400 gram Goa red chilli powder dala hua hai. Fir jo weight wise na unhone teen tarah se product dale hue hai.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Hamare sirf 125 gram wala hai.
Customer: Unka naam fir se bata sakte hai Mohan
Executive: Mohan Mohan N Chari Rice and Flour Mill naam se company hai.
Customer: Hmm, okay.
Executive: Shayad aap jante bhi honge.
Customer: Nahi aa raha hai. Kahan search karna hai unka by list mein aur kuch mein? Kahan Google pe bhi aap dal Google pe bhi dal sakte hai. Wo Mapusa location Goa mein hi hai na?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Mohan
Executive: Main aapko screenshot bhej deta hu aapko. Okay, screenshot.
Executive: Ek minute screenshot bhej raha hu. Jo companies wahan se deal kar rahi hai Goa se.

Customer: Mohan N Chari theek hai.
Customer: Okay, main dekhti hu unke profile se ek baar.
Executive: Haan ek baar aap profile check kar lijiye aap. Theek hai agar koi bhi hota hai wo WhatsApp pe message mujhe kar dijiyega. Theek hai. Okay. Filhal maine photo upload kar di hai aapki. Koi bhi ye concern photo wala main abhi close kar raha hu aapka. Theek hai agar lagta hai ki concern mein phir aapko koi other issue hai to aap mujhe WhatsApp pe directly message kar sakte hai anytime. Okay ma'am?
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Thank you so much.
Customer: Thank you.
Executive: Have a good day.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to change the primary photo of product.

- Only four products are listed on IndiaMART.



Resolution:

- Executive updated the primary photo.

- Executive suggested adding more products and keywords.

- Executive shared details of competitor company.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will check competitor's profile.

- Customer will message on WhatsApp if needed.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- primary photo, product update, keywords, competitor
